mapper.select: select re.REPORTID REPORTID, re.RID RID, re.REPORTREASON REPORTREASON, re.REPORTDATE REPORTDATE, re.MUID MUID, r.RID RID_0, r.TITLE TITLE, r.CONTENT CONTENT, r.RDATE RDATE, r.RFILE RFILE, r.READCOUNT READCOUNT, r.GRADE GRADE, r.HPID HPID, r.MUID MUID_1, r.STATUS STATUS from report re, review r where re.rid=r.rid
mapper.update: update member_user set report_count=report_count+1 where muid=#{muid}
mapper.select: select * from member_user m where report_count >=5
